text: As clear-headed as he is kind-hearted, @amitabhmattoo writes powerful prose to advance sensible policy on a range of national questions. His forthcoming series in @the_hindu will not only inform but also soothe tempers in this highly polarised season. Stay tuned.
author: vargheseKgeorge

text: This is going to be fascinating! Looking forward...
author: vargheseKgeorge

text: Aspirational India...strong leader. What have we become!!
author: vargheseKgeorge
